text:
Hey guys! :wave: :wave:

Has anyone already tried configuring the Web Vitals library but through Google Tag Manager (GA4)? <https://github.com/GoogleChrome/web-vitals#send-the-results-to-google-tag-manager>

I managed to add variables and events from the template according to the instructions - unfortunately in this template Datalayer object only contains 6 parameters:
id, name, value, delta, valueRounded, deltaRounded.
<https://www.simoahava.com/analytics/track-core-web-vitals-in-ga4-with-google-tag-manager/#:~:text=This%20is%20what,object%20contains%3A>

Do any of you know how to add for e.g. an eventTarget using this template (as a debug_target, so that it is clear which element affects which metric)? Or simply in the code but without using the gtag() method as it is not present on my site, as I am using a script with GTM and not gtag. I don't see this in the readme on github. I would be grateful for hints

My webpage has some CSS code that is preceded by an "<!-- Editor Styles -->" HTML comment. This code is not in the page template. Where do I change that code?
<https://www-optimaoffice-com.sandbox.hs-sites.com/team>
THANKS!
Those are styles added by settings within the HS page editor
So you can reset styles within the page editor, or clone the module and modify it so styles can't be applied in the page editor
Thanks <@U03KAK3R4GY> for the response! In the actual page editor (vs template editor), I cannot find the code in any of the modules or page settings. Are those the places you were referring to?

Yeah, those styles added within <!-- Editor Styles --> is CSS generated by settings within the actual page editor (so it's not editable code). Look at any default HubSpot modules included in the page editor in the "Styles" tab to fix..
Anybody here going to INBOUND?! Would love to connect there if so!! :orange_heart:

Ah, what a rookie mistake!
1. I was looking for a textbox with the code.
2. I did not push the Margin button to see the value shown in the code.
Thanks for your time & patience!

hello - theres a lot of channels so idk if another one is best lol but developing a public app, trying to verify domain - added the TXT record and it wonâ€™t verify, can anyone verify if it needs to be host name at @ instead of www?
